EmailTemplate.name: Q42017PriceChange.Q42017PriceChange_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Selective Parts Price Changes Effective November 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer, You are receiving this notification because Honeywell will be updating prices on a select group of parts effective November 1st.
To prevent order disruptions, we recommend these steps:
- Access updated pricing on the Honeywell MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/pricing-catalogs]]> Portal, EDI interfaces and pricing excel files on November 1, 2017 - Review this pricing and apply it to all new purchase orders created on or after November 1, 2017 - Update reference pricing in your system as needed
If you have any questions, please contact your Honeywell business focal.
The MyAerospace Portal <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]> is always available for your order management needs, including parts quoting, ordering, and tracking. View MyAerospace updates and tutorials here <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us/myaerospace-training]]>.
Visit MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
